question: I am caring for a friend who is 74 years old.  She has congestive heart failure, failing kidneys, copd, diabetes, and stomach ulcers.   She smokes and drinks a lot of diet soda.   She has 0 energy most days.   Just walking out to the deck to smoke takes all her energy and she has to sit quite awhile to get breathing better.   She sits on the sofa and watches tv all day and sits on the computer and plays games all evening.   This is all she does as she does not have the energy to do anything else.   Is their any chance that she will get any better??
title: multible health issues
